summary: Adds crafting recipes for Gilded Wolf Armor to the game.
descriptionHtml:
Hello!  This is my first upload to the Nexus, so please bear with me as I learn how to do this.

This mod is a basic exercise in retexturing, recipe creation, et cetera.  It was a personal use mod, and I have decided to put it up here in case anybody finds it helpful or appealing.  Please ask for permission before doing anything drastic with it, but personal use is fine by me.

Enjoy!

Cordially,
- NjalTheKnut
author: NjalTheKnut
